021import net.tnemc.item.AbstractItemStack;
022import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.BukkitItemStack;
023import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.VanillaProvider;
024import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitBundleComponent;
025import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitContainerComponent;
026import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitCustomNameComponent;
027import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitDamageComponent;
028import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitEnchantmentsComponent;
029import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitItemModelComponent;
030import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitItemNameComponent;
031import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitLoreComponent;
032import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitMaxStackSizeComponent;
033import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitModelDataComponent;
034import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitModelDataOldComponent;
035import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitProfileComponent;
036import net.tnemc.item.bukkit.platform.impl.BukkitShulkerColorComponent;
037import net.tnemc.item.platform.ItemPlatform;
038import net.tnemc.item.providers.ItemProvider;
039import net.tnemc.item.providers.VersionUtil;
040import org.bukkit.Bukkit;
041import org.bukkit.DyeColor;
042import org.bukkit.NamespacedKey;
043import org.bukkit.Registry;
044import org.bukkit.attribute.AttributeModifier;
045import org.bukkit.block.banner.PatternType;
046import org.bukkit.enchantments.Enchantment;
047import org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlot;
048import org.bukkit.inventory.EquipmentSlotGroup;
049import org.bukkit.inventory.ItemRarity;
050import org.bukkit.inventory.ItemStack;
051import org.bukkit.inventory.meta.trim.TrimMaterial;
052import org.bukkit.inventory.meta.trim.TrimPattern;
053import org.bukkit.potion.PotionEffectType;
054import org.jetbrains.annotations.NotNull;
055import org.json.simple.JSONObject;
056import org.json.simple.parser.ParseException;
057
058import java.util.Locale;
059import java.util.Optional;
060
061/**
062 * BukkitItemPlatform
063 *
064 * @author creatorfromhell
065 * @since 0.1.7.7
066 */
067public class BukkitItemPlatform extends ItemPlatform<BukkitItemStack, ItemStack> {
068
069  public static final BukkitItemPlatform PLATFORM = new BukkitItemPlatform();
070  //TODO: make this an actual singleton setup
071
072  protected final VanillaProvider defaultProvider = new VanillaProvider();
073
074  private BukkitItemPlatform() {
075
076    super();
077  }
078
079  /**
080   * @return the version that is being used currently
081   */
082  @Override
083  public String version() {
084    return Bukkit.getServer().getBukkitVersion().split("-")[0];
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public void addDefaults() {
089
090    registerConversions();
091
092    //bukkit base implementation.
093    addMulti(new BukkitBundleComponent());
094    addMulti(new BukkitContainerComponent());
095    addMulti(new BukkitCustomNameComponent());
096    addMulti(new BukkitDamageComponent());
097    addMulti(new BukkitEnchantmentsComponent());
098    addMulti(new BukkitItemModelComponent());
099    addMulti(new BukkitItemNameComponent());
100    addMulti(new BukkitLoreComponent());
101    addMulti(new BukkitMaxStackSizeComponent());
102    addMulti(new BukkitModelDataComponent());
103    addMulti(new BukkitModelDataOldComponent());
104    addMulti(new BukkitProfileComponent());
105    addMulti(new BukkitShulkerColorComponent());
106
107  }
108
109  /**
110   * Retrieves the default provider for the item stack comparison.
111   *
112   * @return the default provider for the item stack comparison.
113   */
114  @Override
115  public @NotNull ItemProvider<ItemStack> defaultProvider() {
116
117    return defaultProvider;
118  }
119
120  /**
121   * Retrieves the identifier of the default provider for the item stack comparison.
122   *
123   * @return The identifier of the default provider for the item stack comparison.
124   */
125  @Override
126  public @NotNull String defaultProviderIdentifier() {
127
128    return defaultProvider.identifier();
129  }
130
131  /**
132   * Converts the given locale stack to an instance of {@link AbstractItemStack}
133   *
134   * @param locale the locale to convert
135   *
136   * @return the converted locale of type I
137   */
138  @Override
139  public BukkitItemStack locale(final ItemStack locale) {
140
141    return new BukkitItemStack().of(locale);
142  }
143
144  @SuppressWarnings({"deprecation", "UnstableApiUsage" })
145  private void registerConversions() {
146
147    //RegisterConversion for EquipmentSlot
148    converter.registerConversion(String.class, EquipmentSlot.class, input -> {
149      switch (input.toUpperCase()) {
150        case "HAND": return EquipmentSlot.HAND;
151        case "OFF_HAND": return EquipmentSlot.OFF_HAND;
152        case "FEET": return EquipmentSlot.FEET;
153        case "LEGS": return EquipmentSlot.LEGS;
154        case "CHEST": return EquipmentSlot.CHEST;
155        case "HEAD": return EquipmentSlot.HEAD;
156        case "BODY": return EquipmentSlot.BODY;
157        default: return EquipmentSlot.HAND;
158      }
159    });
160
161    converter.registerConversion(EquipmentSlot.class, String.class, input->switch(input) {
162      case HAND -> "HAND";
163      case OFF_HAND -> "OFF_HAND";
164      case FEET -> "FEET";
165      case LEGS -> "LEGS";
166      case CHEST -> "CHEST";
167      case HEAD -> "HEAD";
168      case BODY -> "BODY";
169      case SADDLE -> "SADDLE";
170      default -> "HAND";
171    });
172
173    //RegisterConversion for EquipmentSlotGroup
174    converter.registerConversion(String.class, EquipmentSlotGroup.class, input -> {
175      final EquipmentSlotGroup group = EquipmentSlotGroup.getByName(input);
176      if(group == null) {
177        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown input: " + input);
178      }
179      return group;
180    });
181
182    converter.registerConversion(EquipmentSlotGroup.class, String.class, EquipmentSlotGroup::toString);
183
184    //Register Conversions for AttributeModifier
185    converter.registerConversion(String.class, AttributeModifier.Operation.class, input->switch(input.toLowerCase()) {
186      case "add_value" -> AttributeModifier.Operation.ADD_NUMBER;
187      case "add_multiplied_base" -> AttributeModifier.Operation.ADD_SCALAR;
188      case "add_multiplied_total" -> AttributeModifier.Operation.MULTIPLY_SCALAR_1;
189      default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown input: " + input);
190    });
191
192    converter.registerConversion(AttributeModifier.Operation.class, String.class, input ->switch(input) {
193      case ADD_NUMBER -> "add_value";
194      case ADD_SCALAR -> "add_multiplied_base";
195      case MULTIPLY_SCALAR_1 -> "add_multiplied_total";
196    });
197
198    //Register conversions for DyeColor
199    converter.registerConversion(String.class, DyeColor.class, input ->switch(input.toLowerCase(Locale.ROOT)) {
200      case "white" -> DyeColor.WHITE;
201      case "orange" -> DyeColor.ORANGE;
202      case "magenta" -> DyeColor.MAGENTA;
203      case "light_blue" -> DyeColor.LIGHT_BLUE;
204      case "yellow" -> DyeColor.YELLOW;
205      case "lime" -> DyeColor.LIME;
206      case "pink" -> DyeColor.PINK;
207      case "gray" -> DyeColor.GRAY;
208      case "light_gray" -> DyeColor.LIGHT_GRAY;
209      case "cyan" -> DyeColor.CYAN;
210      case "purple" -> DyeColor.PURPLE;
211      case "blue" -> DyeColor.BLUE;
212      case "brown" -> DyeColor.BROWN;
213      case "green" -> DyeColor.GREEN;
214      case "red" -> DyeColor.RED;
215      case "black" -> DyeColor.BLACK;
216      default -> throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown DyeColor: " + input);
217    });
218
219    converter.registerConversion(DyeColor.class, String.class, input ->switch(input) {
220      case WHITE -> "white";
221      case ORANGE -> "orange";
222      case MAGENTA -> "magenta";
223      case LIGHT_BLUE -> "light_blue";
224      case YELLOW -> "yellow";
225      case LIME -> "lime";
226      case PINK -> "pink";
227      case GRAY -> "gray";
228      case LIGHT_GRAY -> "light_gray";
229      case CYAN -> "cyan";
230      case PURPLE -> "purple";
231      case BLUE -> "blue";
232      case BROWN -> "brown";
233      case GREEN -> "green";
234      case RED -> "red";
235      case BLACK -> "black";
236    });
237
238    //Register Conversions for PatternType, which will be dependent on versions
239    //We'll separate the legacy find methods from the modern ones in order to maintain one component
240    // class for both.
241    if(VersionUtil.isOneTwentyOne(version())) {
242
243      converter.registerConversion(String.class, PatternType.class, input->{
244
245        final NamespacedKey key = NamespacedKey.fromString(input);
246        if(key != null) {
247
248          final PatternType patternType = Registry.BANNER_PATTERN.get(key);
249          if(patternType != null) {
250
251            return patternType;
252          }
253        }
254        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown PatternType: " + input);
255      });
256
257      if(VersionUtil.isOneTwentyOneFour(version())) {
258
259        converter.registerConversion(PatternType.class, String.class, input->{
260
261          final NamespacedKey key = input.getKeyOrThrow();
262
263          return key.toString();
264        });
265      } else {
266
267        converter.registerConversion(PatternType.class, String.class, input->{
268
269          final NamespacedKey key = input.getKey();
270
271          return key.toString();
272        });
273      }
274
275    } else {
276
277      converter.registerConversion(String.class, PatternType.class, PatternType::valueOf);
278
279      converter.registerConversion(PatternType.class, String.class, PatternType::getIdentifier);
280    }
281
282    //Register Conversions for Enchantment, which will be dependent on versions
283    //We'll separate the legacy find methods from the modern ones in order to maintain one component
284    // class for both.
285    if(VersionUtil.isOneTwentyOneFour(version())) {
286
287      converter.registerConversion(String.class, Enchantment.class, (final String input)->{
288
289        final NamespacedKey key = NamespacedKey.fromString(input);
290        if(key != null) {
291
292          return Registry.ENCHANTMENT.getOrThrow(key);
293        }
294        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown Enchantment: " + input);
295      });
296
297      converter.registerConversion(Enchantment.class, String.class, (final Enchantment input)->input.getKeyOrThrow().toString());
298
299    } else if(VersionUtil.isOneThirteen(version())) {
300      converter.registerConversion(String.class, Enchantment.class, (final String input)->{
301
302        final Enchantment enchantment = Enchantment.getByKey(NamespacedKey.fromString(input));
303        if(enchantment == null) {
304
305          throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown Enchantment: " + input);
306        }
307        return enchantment;
308      });
309
310      converter.registerConversion(Enchantment.class, String.class, (final Enchantment input)->input.getKey().getKey());
311    } else {
312
313      converter.registerConversion(String.class, Enchantment.class, (final String input)->{
314
315        final Enchantment enchantment = Enchantment.getByName(input);
316        if(enchantment == null) {
317
318          throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown Enchantment: " + input);
319        }
320        return enchantment;
321      });
322
323      converter.registerConversion(Enchantment.class, String.class, Enchantment::getName);
324    }
325
326    //Register Conversions for Trim Material, which will be dependent on versions
327    //We'll separate the legacy find methods from the modern ones in order to maintain one component
328    // class for both.
329    if(VersionUtil.isOneTwentyOneFour(version())) {
330
331      converter.registerConversion(TrimMaterial.class, String.class, input->input.getKeyOrThrow().toString());
332
333      converter.registerConversion(String.class, TrimMaterial.class, input->{
334        final NamespacedKey key = NamespacedKey.fromString(input);
335        if(key != null) {
336
337          return Registry.TRIM_MATERIAL.getOrThrow(key);
338        }
339        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown TrimMaterial: " + input);
340      });
341
342    } else if(VersionUtil.isOneTwenty(version())) {
343
344      converter.registerConversion(TrimMaterial.class, String.class, input->input.getKey().toString());
345
346      converter.registerConversion(String.class, TrimMaterial.class, input->{
347        final NamespacedKey key = NamespacedKey.fromString(input);
348        if(key != null) {
349
350          return Registry.TRIM_MATERIAL.get(key);
351        }
352        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown TrimMaterial: " + input);
353      });
354    }
355
356    //Register Conversions for NamespacedKey, which will be dependent on versions
357    //We'll separate the legacy find methods from the modern ones in order to maintain one component
358    // class for both.
359    converter.registerConversion(ItemRarity.class, String.class, input->switch(input) {
360      case EPIC -> "epic";
361      case RARE -> "rare";
362      case UNCOMMON -> "uncommon";
363      default -> "common";
364    });
365
366    converter.registerConversion(String.class, ItemRarity.class, input->switch(input.toLowerCase()) {
367      case "epic" -> ItemRarity.EPIC;
368      case "rare" -> ItemRarity.RARE;
369      case "uncommon" -> ItemRarity.UNCOMMON;
370      default -> ItemRarity.COMMON;
371    });
372
373    //Register Conversions for Trim Pattern, which will be dependent on versions
374    //We'll separate the legacy find methods from the modern ones in order to maintain one component
375    // class for both.
376    if(VersionUtil.isOneTwentyOneFour(version())) {
377
378      converter.registerConversion(TrimPattern.class, String.class, input->input.getKeyOrThrow().toString());
379
380      converter.registerConversion(String.class, TrimPattern.class, input->{
381        final NamespacedKey key = NamespacedKey.fromString(input);
382        if(key != null) {
383
384          return Registry.TRIM_PATTERN.getOrThrow(key);
385        }
386        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown TrimPattern: " + input);
387      });
388
389    } else if(VersionUtil.isOneTwenty(version())) {
390
391      converter.registerConversion(TrimPattern.class, String.class, input->input.getKey().toString());
392
393      converter.registerConversion(String.class, TrimPattern.class, input->{
394        final NamespacedKey key = NamespacedKey.fromString(input);
395        if(key != null) {
396
397          return Registry.TRIM_PATTERN.get(key);
398        }
399        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown TrimPattern: " + input);
400      });
401    }
402
403    if(VersionUtil.isOneTwentyOneFour(version())) {
404
405      converter.registerConversion(PotionEffectType.class, String.class, input->input.getKeyOrThrow().toString());
406      converter.registerConversion(String.class, PotionEffectType.class, input->{
407        final NamespacedKey key = NamespacedKey.fromString(input);
408        if(key != null) {
409
410          return Registry.EFFECT.getOrThrow(key);
411        }
412        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown PotionEffectType: " + input);
413      });
414    } else {
415
416      converter.registerConversion(PotionEffectType.class, String.class, PotionEffectType::getName);
417      converter.registerConversion(String.class, PotionEffectType.class, input->{
418
419        final PotionEffectType type = PotionEffectType.getByName(input);
420        if(type != null) {
421
422          return type;
423        }
424        throw new IllegalArgumentException("Unknown PotionEffectType: " + input);
425      });
426    }
427  }
428
429  /**
430   * Initializes and returns an AbstractItemStack object by deserializing the provided JSON object.
431   *
432   * @param object the JSON object to deserialize
433   *
434   * @return an initialized AbstractItemStack object
435   */
436  @Override
437  public Optional<BukkitItemStack> initSerialized(final JSONObject object) {
438
439    try {
440      return Optional.ofNullable(new BukkitItemStack().of(object));
441    } catch(final ParseException e) {
442      return Optional.empty();
443    }
444  }
445}
